author: jonesde
msg: Small cleanup to use already declared variable

author: jonesde
msg: Some comments, small changes based on recent fix of ProductCategoryLink

author: djd
msg: Remove a couple of invalid checks on just allocated byte arrays in the store.
Checks were invalid because neither condition could ever be true, the
java new byte[] operator will always return an object of the correct size

author: jonesde
msg: Fixed an odd bugg in some decorator (screen and template) code where the screens object was pointing to the wrong context, making certain variables that should have been available not available, especially in cases where the ScreenRenderer screens object is used, like the FTL files with screens.render; this fixes a couple of issues, but the main test case was the productCategoryId variable in the ProductCategoryLink.ftl file
